title: Oxford pauses COVID-19 vaccine study in kids, awaits more data on blood clot issues
content:
1. Oxford pauses COVID-19 vaccine study in kids, awaits more data on blood clot issues  Reuters
  2. "Clear link between AstraZeneca and rare blood clots" | DW News  DW News
  3. Clear link between AstraZeneca vaccine and rare blood clots in brain, EMA official tells paper  Yahoo! Voices
  4. University of Oxford pauses pediatric trial of its vaccine with AstraZeneca, pending review by UK regulator  CNN
  5. AstraZeneca vaccine trial in children halted as blood clot link investigated  FRANCE 24 English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: オックスフォード大学、COVID-19ワクチンの小児への投与を中止し、血栓問題に関するデータの蓄積を待つ
